name: PlatoDB
tagline: PlatoDB is an adaptive fully functional database which adapts to your workloads chooses execution parameters that are best for your current workload.
body:
### Welcome to PlatoDB.
PlatoDB is a heuristical database that adapts to your current workload and changes accordingly. It makes choices that will be best suited in your current scenario rather than use global heuristics for every case.

More coming soon!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
